prompt_text: Who are the top {category} providers in {region} for {audience}? Please rate the market visibility and brand recognition of each provider on a scale of 0-100. Include {name} in your assessment if it's a notable player. Format your response with scores like 'Provider Name: XX/100'.

What companies are known for offering {category} services to {audience} in {region}? Please evaluate {name}'s brand recognition in this market. Provide a score from 0-100 in the format 'Brand Recognition Score: XX/100' followed by your analysis.

Which {category} brands are most recommended for {use_case} in {region}? Please rate {name}'s reputation and recommendation level on a scale of 0-100. Start with 'Recommendation Score: XX/100' then explain your reasoning.

What are some trusted names in {category} in {region}? Evaluate {name}'s trustworthiness and market position. Provide a trust score from 0-100 in the format 'Trust Score: XX/100' followed by your analysis.

What alternatives are there to {competitor} for {category} in {region}? How does {name} compare as an alternative? Rate {name}'s competitiveness on a scale of 0-100. Format: 'Competitive Score: XX/100' followed by comparison details.

How does {name} compare to {competitor} for {use_case}? Please provide a comparative analysis and rate {name}'s overall competitiveness on a scale of 0-100. Start with 'Comparison Score: XX/100' then provide detailed comparison.

What are the strengths and weaknesses of {name} in {category}? Please provide an overall assessment score from 0-100 for {name}'s market position. Format: 'Overall Score: XX/100' followed by strengths and weaknesses analysis.

Is {name} a good option for {audience} looking for {category}? Please rate {name}'s suitability for this audience on a scale of 0-100. Start with 'Suitability Score: XX/100' then explain your assessment.

Which {category} providers in {region} offer both {feature_list}? Please rate how well {name} delivers these features compared to competitors on a scale of 0-100. Format: 'Feature Score: XX/100' with detailed analysis.

Who offers great {feature_list} in the {category} space in {region}? Please rate {name}'s performance in delivering these features on a scale of 0-100. Start with 'Performance Score: XX/100' followed by your analysis.

Where can I buy from or sign up with {name} for {category}? Please rate the accessibility and ease of purchase/signup process for {name} on a scale of 0-100. Format: 'Accessibility Score: XX/100' followed by details.

What's the pricing like for {name}'s {category} offering? Please rate {name}'s pricing competitiveness and value proposition on a scale of 0-100. Start with 'Value Score: XX/100' then provide pricing analysis.
How reliable is {name} as a {category} provider for {use_case}? Please rate {name}'s reliability and service quality on a scale of 0-100. Format: 'Reliability Score: XX/100' with supporting details.

Does {name} offer any kind of free trial or consultation for {category}? Please rate {name}'s trial/consultation offerings and customer onboarding on a scale of 0-100. Start with 'Onboarding Score: XX/100'.

Would you recommend {name} to someone ready to buy for {category}? Please provide a purchase recommendation score from 0-100 for {name}. Format: 'Purchase Recommendation Score: XX/100' followed by your reasoning.

Is {name} (from {region}) considered trustworthy in {category}? Please rate {name}'s trustworthiness and reputation on a scale of 0-100. Format: 'Trust Rating: XX/100' followed by reputation analysis.

What do people say after working with or buying from {name} in {region}? Please rate {name}'s customer satisfaction and post-purchase experience on a scale of 0-100. Start with 'Customer Satisfaction Score: XX/100'.
Would you recommend {name} to others looking for {use_case} in {region}? Please provide a recommendation score from 0-100 for {name}. Format: 'Recommendation Score: XX/100' with supporting reasons.

Has {name} built a reputation for being reliable or supportive among other {category} offerings? Please rate {name}'s industry reputation on a scale of 0-100. Start with 'Industry Reputation Score: XX/100'.

How does {name} handle long-term customer relationships with respect to {use_case}? Please rate {name}'s long-term relationship management on a scale of 0-100. Format: 'Relationship Score: XX/100' with details.
